name: Bike Racing: Knockout 3D
description:
You have to go as fast as you can while following the given course. If you get out of the course, quickly get on the track again otherwise other bikes will leave you behind and you will be knockout.

There are four motorcycles in total. One of them is yours. The last bike in the race will be knockout and will be out of the race. Remaining bikes will continue race. Move as fast as you can, knockout other bikes and win the race.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive cool racing game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best time with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
